  • Getting started

How do I use tkeclipse?

Getting started

To start TkECLiPSe, either type the command tkeclipse at an operating system command-line prompt, or select TkECLiPSe from the program menu on Windows. This will bring up the TkECLiPSe top-level, which is shown in Figure 3.1.

Figure: TkECLiPSe top-level

Note that help on TkECLiPSe and its component tools is available from the Help menu in the top-level window. If you need more information than can be found in this manual, try looking in the Help menu.


Warwick Harvey
